shortDescription: Advanced telecom solutions provider specializing in VoIP systems, call center software, and cloud communication for businesses of all sizes.
longDescription: At Digital Matrix, we specialize in delivering advanced telecom solutions that help businesses communicate smarter, operate efficiently, and grow faster. With years of industry expertise, we understand the challenges modern businesses face and provide tailored services to meet those needs. Our team of experts—engineers, developers, and support professionals—work around the clock to ensure seamless communication, reliability, and innovation. We don't just provide services; we build long-term partnerships that empower our clients to succeed in a competitive world.
imagesNote: Team photo and office images available on website
notes: Primary domain dmediatel.com appears defunct; business operates via dialermatrix.com. Owner Josh Olinger founded company in July 2023. 90+ projects completed per website.
dataSource: hubspot + web enrichment via Claude Code MCP
